SYSTEM: ReReNORAthens.v1-boris.pdf: Página 46
Thesauri
Patterns for Re-engineering Thesauri
•
Thesauri1 are controlled vocabularies of terms in a particular 
domain with hierarchical, associative and equivalence relations 
q
between terms. Thesauri are mainly used for indexing and 
retrieving of articles in large databases. An example of 
thesaurus is the AGROVOC2 thesaurus.
thesaurus is the AGROVOC thesaurus.
1. International Standard Organization (ISO). Documentation – Guidelines for the establishment
and development of monolingual thesaurus 1986 Report ISO 2788
46
and development of monolingual thesaurus, 1986. Report ISO 2788.
2. http://www.fao.org/agrovoc/
speaker: SYSTEM
